tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CustomerLoyaltyProgramData (
  customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  join_date DATE,
  total_points INT,
  last_purchase DATE
)

CREATE TABLE loyalty_program_data (
    loyalty_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    join_date DATE,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE retention_rates (
    retention_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    membership_level VARCHAR(50),
    assessment_date DATE,
    retention_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE loyalty_program_data (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    membership_level VARCHAR(50),
    join_date DATE,
    points_earned INT,
    points_redeemed INT,
    total_purchases INT
);

CREATE TABLE program_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    analysis_date DATE,
    retention_rate FLOAT,
    effectiveness_rating FLOAT,
    feedback TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE loyalty_program_customers (
	customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	customer_name VARCHAR(255),
	loyalty_points INT,
	last_purchase_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE loyalty_points_usage (
	transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	customer_id INT,
	transaction_date DATE,
	points_used INT
)

CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
	feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	customer_id INT,
	feedback_text TEXT,
	feedback_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE retention_rates (
	year INT,
	retention_rate DECIMAL(5,2)
)

CREATE TABLE loyalty_program_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES loyalty_program_customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES loyalty_program_customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_engagement (
    engagement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    engagement_type VARCHAR(50),
    engagement_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES loyalty_program_customers(customer_id)
);
